name: Do You Like Holes?
description:
Story The year is 2023. The Post Apocalyptic Era started 3 years ago. There have been a lot of holes on the hearts, walls, glasses and doors since it started.  We are offering you the hole filling which is very prestigious job in our decade. Gameplay & Controls You must fill all the holes in the area that we sent you. You get the materials by taking material boxes. If we weren't do that, they would be looted. Sometimes , the bad guys come and make you unhappy.  So we also send you a pistol in a box. You find it the building which is in the middle . You can take it if you use the drone.  Instructions:  -Fill the interior holes first.  -If you fill all the holes of a house, the house is protected by us and bad guys never comes again. LMB,RMB or Scroll Button to Exit DroneP to Change Post Process F to Change Camera Focus R to Drop Last Box RMB to Filler Gun LMB to  Pistol
You can take the pistol box by moving cursor to box.
